name: Yoshi's Island Eggonomy - Complete System
author: Yoshi's Eggonomy Team
description: Complete egg-based economy with tokens, games, PvP battles, and progression system. Includes: Buy tokens, Chomp Tunnel, Hatch Roll, Duel Nest PvP with auto-resolver, rank system, inventory management, and economy monitoring.

globalVariables.name: bigNestFund
globalVariables.description: Primary economy fund - collects 70% of token purchases

globalVariables.name: eggCartonJackpot
globalVariables.description: Jackpot fund - collects 20% of token purchases

timedActions.name: Duel Resolver Timer
timedActions.description: Checks every 60 seconds for duels that need to be resolved (10 minutes after acceptance)

setupInstructions: 2. Configure Pouch Eggs currency in Settings ‚Üí Loyalty
3. Set passive income: 5 eggs per 10 minutes for online viewers, 10 for active chatters
4. Enable the !eggs command in loyalty settings
5. Verify the Duel Resolver Timer is enabled (checks every 60 seconds)
features: Token Economy: Mystery Eggs (20ü•ö), Dice Eggs (10ü•ö), Duel Eggs (5ü•ö)
Chomp Tunnel: Risk-based game with streak multipliers and golden eggs
Hatch Roll: D20 luck game with tiered rewards
Duel Nest PvP: Player vs player battles with auto-resolution
Rank System: 7 tiers from Hatchling to Egg Emperor
Currency Sinks: 10% of purchases removed, 15% of duels to economy fund
Economy Monitoring: Track funds and balance
